Name: Designate Staten Island as the Borough of Parks.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to designating the motto of the borough of Staten Island as the borough of parks.
Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

	Section 1.  Chapter two of title two of the administrative code of the city of New York, is hereby amended by adding a new section 2-107 to read as follows:
	� 2-107 Official motto; borough of Staten Island. The following phrase is hereby adopted as the official motto of the borough of Staten Island;  "The Borough of Parks" . 
	�2.  This local law shall take effect immediately.

\ulnone\tab\'a72.  This local law shall take effect immediately.\par
